name: Webinar on Materials Technology and Research
content: Dear Colleague Due to the global pandemic situation, Meetings International is organizing Webinar on Materials Technology and Research will be hosted on May 12, 2020 at 9 am (GMT+9). For more details, visit: https://www.meetingsint.com/webinars/materialstech Materials Technology and Research is a continuation of Materials conferences. With the presence of experts, Meetings International has organized Materials 2018 in Rome, Italy; Materials 2019 in Paris, France & Smart Materials 2020 in Paris, France Register and save your seat for Materials Technology and Research Regards: Katherine Joseph Program Manager WhatsApp: +441250400009 Email: materialsresearch@annualmeetings.net
